name: color chaos infinity
description:
A little game game made by a 16 years old teenager.

UPTADE

- remove  "press  e" .

- background 

- remove some unused sprites

MONSTERS

Eye =  will follow you when you're not looking. 

Slime = when it dies it will spawn a smaller slime. 

Ghost = will follow you when he sees you. 

Mini slime = just a mini slime. 

and more...

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

CONTROLS

arrow keys = move

left mouse button = shoot

right mouse button = use

r = restart

///THANKS/////

Mirella (my sis): some sprites
